s.text: Republican senators called Reno's decision "suspicious," but, cheered on by the Washington Post , vowed to get at the facts through congressional hearings.

Though the highest-ranking CIA official ever accused of espionage, Nicholson appears to have done less damage than Aldrich Ames.
